text: The women's 3000 metres race of the 2014–15 ISU Speed Skating World Cup 7, arranged in the Gunda Niemann-Stirnemann-Halle in Erfurt, Germany, was held on 22 March 2015. ==Result== The race took place on Sunday, 22 March, scheduled in the afternoon session, at 13:00. {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text- align:center" !
